text:
TL,DR: it looks like 32 bit Reader shows as “Adobe Acrobat Reader” and 64 bit
shows as “Adobe Acrobat” or “Adobe Acrobat (64-bit).” 
Interesting, I see this for Reader on my PC:
%40SN6PR08MB5517.namprd08.prod.outlook.com

metadata.topic: Detecting whether PC has Acrobat or Reader
metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Detecting whether PC has Acrobat or Reader
